item.title: This Theme Readme (github)
item.description: This content is created using: {{< readfile "content/README.md" "true" >}} See more here: This Theme Shortcodes  W3.CSS Basic Theme for Hugo W3.CSS Basic is a website template built with W3.CSS. Inspiration was taken from Universal. It is highly configurable. Change all colors in the blink of an eye, choose Google fonts or use Google Global Site Tags. See the exampleSite for a demo. Latest News Teaser images are now resource images New Front Matter (replacing teaserPic): resImgTeaser:teaserpics/pixabay.

item.title: This Theme Shortcodes
item.description: You can extend Hugoâ€™s built-in shortcodes by creating your own using the same templating syntax as that for single and list pages. Shortcodes are a means to consolidate templating into small, reusable snippets that you can embed directly inside of your content. In this sense, you can think of shortcodes as the intermediary between page and list templates and basic content files. https://gohugo.io/templates/shortcode-templates Shortcodes in this Theme for W3.
